text: During the 1965–66 season Hearts competed in the Scottish First Division, the Scottish Cup, the Scottish League Cup, the Inter-Cities Fairs Cup and the East of Scotland Shield. == Fixtures == === Friendlies === === East of Scotland Shield === === Inter-Cities Fairs Cup === === League Cup === === Scottish Cup === === Scottish First Division === == See also == *List of Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons == References == *Statistical Record 65-66 == External links == *Official Club website Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons Heart of Midlothian
title: 1965–66 Heart of Midlothian F.C. season
